name: Blockworks Daily
title: Utf8b8jfqg Trump Turns Crypto Policy Up To 11
text:
Synopsis
The Trump administration is proposing aggressive crypto-friendly policies that could potentially provide massive tax benefits and strategic support for US-based cryptocurrencies, but these proposals appear more focused on self-dealing than substantive economic strategy.

Key Insights
- Trump administration issued an executive order declaring the digital asset industry plays a "crucial role in innovation and economic development"
- Eric Trump has proposed making profits from US-based cryptocurrencies exempt from capital gains taxes
- The administration is reportedly planning an "America-first strategic reserve" to buy and hold crypto assets issued by US-based entities
- The proposals could potentially save President Trump at least $8 billion based on the current market price of his TRUMP token
- Crypto policy experts like Peter Van Valkenburgh are concerned these proposals could damage the crypto industry's reputation
- The proposed policies appear to primarily benefit a small group of stakeholders, potentially including the Trump family's own crypto projects
- The proposals risk being perceived as a massive public policy grift that could undermine crypto's credibility
